Writer: Jonathan Levine (screenplay), Kyle Hunter (screenplay), Ariel Shaffir (screenplay), Evan Goldberg (screenplay), Jonathan Levine (story)
Title: The Night Before
Actors: Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Seth Rogen, Anthony Mackie, Jillian Bell
Plot: On Christmas eve, three lifelong friends spend the night in New York City looking for the Holy Grail of Christmas parties.
